reasoning: Dupuytren contracture is a chronic progressive disease of hand connective tissue. Prevalence estimated at ~4.5% of population (45 per 100k) based on epidemiological studies. More commonly reported as prevalence than incidence due to chronic progressive nature.
source: Dinh P et al. (2012). The epidemiology, pathogenesis, and treatment of Dupuytren disease. J Hand Surg Am. 37(3):535-547
